## Description {#details}

Produce an estimate of the unrolled cost of the specified loop.

This is used to a) produce a cost estimate for partial unrolling and b) to cheaply estimate cost for full unrolling when we don&#39;t want to symbolically evaluate all iterations.

Definition at line 130 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/unrollloop-h">UnrollLoop.h</a>.
